title: Untamed Soul
description: ‘Bound not by blood but loyalty.We live, we ride, and we dieby our own laws’I’m the joker of the pack.The player, the man whore, the one no one takes seriously.While some of my Brothers have fallen,I’ve vowed never to be tied to one woman.When Alex Monroe comes to town, she makes the mistake of interfering with the club.The woman is fiery, irritating, and stubborn…She’s also intoxicating.Alex has secrets of her own.A vendetta scratches deep at her soul.And she won’t give up until she gets what she wants.But when opposites attract, and the line between love and hate gets crossed,Can she tame the untamable?Untamed Soul and all books in the Dirty Soul’s Mc series are a work of fiction and contain adult content. Due to the nature of the series, you should expect to come across various subject matter that some readers may find disturbing.This book is intended for readers 18+
author: Emma Creed
